message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $1,100,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the highest I can go.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900,000 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to come down a bit further, how about $1,050,000?

I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm offering $975,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
